code: /* global chrome */import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function grabElements(){const element=document.getElementById('productTitle');if(element){console.log('Data from element:',element.textContent);}else{console.log('Element with ID "productTitle" not found');}}function App(){useEffect(()=>{chrome.tabs.query({active:true,currentWindow:true},tabs=>{const currentTab=tabs[0];chrome.scripting.executeScript({target:{tabId:currentTab.id},function:grabElements});});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"App-logo",alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Edit ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"src/App.js"})," and fun away yayyyy to reload."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"App-link",href:"https://reactjs.org",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"Learn React"})]})});}export default App;
